description:
Dawn received her Cyndaquil as an egg after she defeated Kotone in a battle during the Johto Festa in Suiren Town. Team Rocket noticed the egg while they were flying away and Meowth used his extender arm to capture the egg.
While escaping from a wild Ursaring, James noticed that the egg was glowing, signifying that it was close to hatching. Dawn was able to recover the egg in time to watch it hatch.
Dawn`s Cyndaquil didn`t get along with her Pilpup just after it hatched as they fought a lot.
name: Hinoarashi (Hikari)
